snippet: Bratislava, Slovakia, makes an excellent getaway from the more popular destinations in the region, especially if you’re tired of the big-city crowds of neighboring Vienna, Budapest and Prague.
abstract: Bratislava, Slovakia, makes an excellent getaway from the more popular destinations in the region, especially for travelers tired of the big-city crowds of neighboring Vienna, Budapest and Prague.
lead_paragraph: Bratislava, Slovakia, makes an excellent getaway from the more popular destinations in the region, especially if you’re tired of the big-city crowds of neighboring Vienna, Budapest and Prague.

headline.seo: In Bratislava, Slovakia, a Chance to Enjoy Local Flavors Without the Crowds — Overnighter
headline.main: A Vienna Getaway Minus the Crowds
